name: Huff & Puff
description:
Huff & Puff is a mix between a brawler and a party game, from two to four players.

Credits :

Alexandre Lucas : Developper

Alexandre Le Van : Developper

Setty El Kreouane : Game Artist

Arnaud Guegherouni : Game Artist

Yoan Mayer : Game Designer / Level Designer

Jean Desbeaux : Sound Designer / Level Designer

 Tech Spec :

Made for PC with Unity and Fmod.

 How to play :

Plugs controllers, choose your characters and play (avoid bluetooth controllers if possible, it tend to do weird things).
